title: VA - 16 Original One-Hit Wonders (A Rockin' House Party!)@320
description:
The criterion that is used to identify a one-hit wonder in this collection is that each
featured artist has enjoyed one hit in the British New Musical Express and Record
Retailer/Music Week single charts.
This means that we meet some artists in this collection, who had a substantial
number of hits in other parts of the world, especially in the USA.
Jimmy Reed and The Dells had a very good run of hits in the USA, durineg their long
careers. Others like Carl Perkins, Lonnie Mack, Tommey Tucker, The Kingsmen,
Robert Parker and Ernie K-Doe, never hit a purple hit patch, but carried out
respectable musical careers, which in Carl Perkins&#039; case holds until today.
But what about the other artists in this collection.
Artists like Hank Mizell, Curtis Lee,Jewel Akens and Bob and Earl at least enjoyed their moment of hit-parade glory.
Their message inspired kids to go into the record store in droves to purchase their hit
singles and bringing immense joy to a large amount of kids at a given time. This is
more than can be said of most of us. (From Liner Notes).


01. Carl Perkins - Blue Suede Shoes                              
02. Bill Justis - Raunchy                                        
03. Hank Mizell - Jungle Rock                                    
04. Ernie K-Doe - Mother-In-Law                                  
05. Curtis Lee - Pretty Little Angel Eyes                        
06. Maurice Williams & The Zodiacs - Stay                        
07. Lonnie Mack - Memphis                                        
08. Jimmy Reed - Shame, Shame, Shame                            
09. The Kingsmen - Louie Louie                                  
10. Tommy Tucker - High Heel Sneakers                            
11. Jewel Akens - The Birds And The Bees                        
12. Robert Parker - Barefootin&#039;                                  
13. Brenton Wood - Gimme Little Sign                            
14. John Fred & The Playboy Band - Judy In Disguise (With Glasses)
15. Bob & Earl - Harlem Shuffle                                  
16. The Dells - I Can Sing The Rainbow/Love Is Blue


Label: Charly
